channel.title: [Help][317][PI] Account creation via login - quick question
channel.description:
Is it possible to remove the ability to log in via the login button on the client? And if the account doesn't exist simply display some text? I would like to force my users to register on the forums before hand so they leave a method of contact. Plus I can update the users with newsletters and it's a great way to keep them on my server.
Can someone provide the names of the files I need to edit, or any relevant links?
Thanks! - Gergy, xWeedscape
